FwkSenCnt.MEANING: a device that uses strong magnetic fields with very short wavelengths

ExCnt.EX: By the end of the war , cavity magnetrons were emitting up to 3.5 million watts of power at stable wavelengths .
By early 1942 an experimental radar using this magnetron was successfully tracking aircraft flying at 50-200 feet to about 30 miles and on occasions out to 45 miles .
